purpose: To provide a curated list of resources for learning and researching Deep Reinforcement Learning
principle: Aggregates and categorizes high-quality resources related to Deep Reinforcement Learning from various sources
reusability: Open-source resource list that can be extended by community contributions
limitations: Dependent on community contributions for updates and may not cover all recent advancements
name: awesome-deep-rl
description: A curated list of awesome Deep Reinforcement Learning resources.
highlight: Comprehensive and curated list of Deep Reinforcement Learning resources
